mapper.sql: ID, APPLY_TYPE, CASE_ID, CREATER_ID, CREATE_TIME, START_TIME, PROP_OPINION, DEFE_OPINION, MANAGER_OPINION, STATUS, OTHER_OPERATING_TIME, MANAGER_OPERATING_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, REAL_END_TIME, AUDIT_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from compromise_apply
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into compromise_apply (ID, APPLY_TYPE, CASE_ID, CREATER_ID, CREATE_TIME, START_TIME, PROP_OPINION, DEFE_OPINION, MANAGER_OPINION, STATUS, OTHER_OPERATING_TIME, MANAGER_OPERATING_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, REAL_END_TIME, AUDIT_TYPE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{propOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{defeOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{managerOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{otherOperatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{managerOperatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{planEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditType,jdbcType=CHAR} )

mapper.update:
update compromise_apply
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_TYPE = #{record.applyType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROP_OPINION = #{record.propOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEFE_OPINION = #{record.defeOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR},
MANAGER_OPINION = #{record.managerOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR},
OTHER_OPERATING_TIME = #{record.otherOperatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MANAGER_OPERATING_TIME = #{record.managerOperatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLAN_END_TIME = #{record.planEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REAL_END_TIME = #{record.realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AUDIT_TYPE = #{record.auditType,jdbcType=CHAR},

update compromise_apply set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_TYPE = #{record.applyType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROP_OPINION = #{record.propOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEFE_OPINION = #{record.defeOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR}, MANAGER_OPINION = #{record.managerOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR}, OTHER_OPERATING_TIME = #{record.otherOperatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MANAGER_OPERATING_TIME = #{record.managerOperatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PLAN_END_TIME = #{record.planEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REAL_END_TIME = #{record.realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AUDIT_TYPE = #{record.auditType,jdbcType=CHAR}

update compromise_apply
APPLY_TYPE = #{applyType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROP_OPINION = #{propOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR},
DEFE_OPINION = #{defeOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR},
MANAGER_OPINION = #{managerOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
OTHER_OPERATING_TIME = #{otherOperatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MANAGER_OPERATING_TIME = #{managerOperatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLAN_END_TIME = #{planEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REAL_END_TIME = #{realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AUDIT_TYPE = #{auditType,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update compromise_apply set APPLY_TYPE = #{applyType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROP_OPINION = #{propOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEFE_OPINION = #{defeOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR}, MANAGER_OPINION = #{managerOpinion,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, OTHER_OPERATING_TIME = #{otherOperatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MANAGER_OPERATING_TIME = #{managerOperatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PLAN_END_TIME = #{planEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REAL_END_TIME = #{realEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AUDIT_TYPE = #{auditType,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ca.id applyId, ca.case_id caseId, ca.create_time createTime, ca.apply_type applyType, ca.prop_opinion propOpinion, ca.defe_opinion defeOpinion, ca.manager_opinion managerOpinion, ca.status status, ca.other_operating_time otherOperatingTime, ca.manager_operating_time managerOperatingTime, ca.audit_type auditType, CASE ca.apply_type WHEN ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.ComproiseApplyTypeEnum@APPLICANT_INITIATED.getCode()} THEN cp.prop_name WHEN ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.ComproiseApplyTypeEnum@COVER_APPLICANT_INITIATED.getCode()} THEN cd.prop_name END propName, CASE ca.apply_type WHEN ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.ComproiseApplyTypeEnum@APPLICANT_INITIATED.getCode()} THEN cd.prop_name WHEN ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.ComproiseApplyTypeEnum@COVER_APPLICANT_INITIATED.getCode()} THEN cp.prop_name END defeName, cm.manager_type duties, ui.name managerName, IF ( ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM case_avoid_record WHERE case_id = #{caseId} AND avoid_type = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseAvoidTypeEnum@SECRETARY.getValue()} AND avoid_id = ui.id AND (status = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseAvoidStatusEnum@WAIT_AUDIT.getValue()} OR status = ${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseAvoidStatusEnum@SUCCESS_AUDIT.getValue()}) ) > 0, '0', '1' ) isApplyAvoid FROM compromise_apply ca, case_info ci, case_proposer cp, case_defendant cd, case_manager cm, user_info ui WHERE ca.case_id = ci.id AND ci.id = cp.case_id AND ci.id = cd.case_id AND ci.id=cm.case_id AND cm.manager_id=ui.id AND cm.manager_type=${@com.zyxy.common.enums.ManagerInfoTypeEnum@ARBITRATION_SECRETARY.getCode()} AND cm.status=${@com.zyxy.common.enums.CaseManagerStatusEnum@OK.getCode()} AND ci.id = #{caseId}
